get_entry

Source: R/entry_functions.R
get_entry.Rd

This function fetches detailed information for a Fantasy Premier League entry given the entry ID(s).

get_entry(entryid = NULL)

Arguments

entryid

The entry ID(s). Can be found on the FPL website under 'Gameweek history' in the URL - https://fantasy.premierleague.com/a/entry/XXXXXX/history.

Examples

get_entry(1076)
#> $id
#> [1] 1076
#> 
#> $joined_time
#> [1] "2019-06-27T11:12:31.485198Z"
#> 
#> $started_event
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $favourite_team
#> [1] 12
#> 
#> $player_first_name
#> [1] "Christian"
#> 
#> $player_last_name
#> [1] "Røed"
#> 
#> $player_region_id
#> [1] 161
#> 
#> $player_region_name
#> [1] "Norway"
#> 
#> $player_region_iso_code_short
#> [1] "NO"
#> 
#> $player_region_iso_code_long
#> [1] "NOR"
#> 
#> $summary_overall_points
#> [1] 37
#> 
#> $summary_overall_rank
#> [1] 107510
#> 
#> $summary_event_points
#> [1] 37
#> 
#> $summary_event_rank
#> NULL
#> 
#> $current_event
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $leagues
